AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Psyborn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a psycast, spontaneously gaining consciousness as a young adult. [PAWN_pronoun] can talk, read, and write, and is mostly typical in intellect for someone their age, but is definitely socially lacking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Psyborn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a psycast, spontaneously gaining consciousness as a young adult. [PAWN_pronoun] can talk, read, and write, and is mostly typical in intellect for someone their age, but is definitely socially lacking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Psyborn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a psycast, spontaneously gaining consciousness as a young adult. [PAWN_pronoun] can talk, read, and write, and is mostly typical in intellect for someone their age, but is definitely socially lacking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Psyborn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by a psycast, spontaneously gaining consciousness as a young adult. [PAWN_pronoun] can talk, read, and write, and is mostly typical in intellect for someone their age, but is definitely socially lacking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Combat aspiring
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] shows innate talent and interest in warfare. [PAWN_pronoun] was immediately awed by the colony's defenses when they were created, showing juvenile excitement over impressive firepower and huge explosions.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artifice aspiring
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] shows innate talent and interest for craftsmanship and tinkering. [PAWN_pronoun] was inquisitive and analytical after they were created, their mind in wonder about how things work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Social aspiring
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] shows innate talent and interest for social activities. [PAWN_pronoun] was completely enamored about making friends and relationships when they were created.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Culinary aspiring
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] shows innate talent and interest for farming and cooking. [PAWN_pronoun] was completely enamored about the natural world and the wonder of taste when they were created.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Medical aspiring
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] shows innate talent and interest in medical work. [PAWN_pronoun] had a strong urge to help those in need when they were created.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Harrowed
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has distant memories and hallucinations about the Psychic Beyond, and it deeply troubles [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] can't explain it well enough, but the disturbing echoes harrows their existence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Jubilant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is just simply glad to exist, everything is a new excitement and sensation to experience after they were created.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gifted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] kept a special connection with the psychic ether after being created, being much more sensitive with psychic phenomenon and has great potential for psycasting theirself.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artistic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] showed great creativity after being created thierself, others find theirself appalled by the outlandish ideas they imagine.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Psycho
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created without much signs of outward emotion or empathy, but instead has a calculating intellect and ruthless determination.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Studious
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was created without showing any particular skills or specializations, but instead has an increased capacity for learning as a whole.
